titles.title: A resolution recognizing the Interstate Compact on Educational Opportunity for Military Children and expressing support for the designation of April 2024 as the "Month of the Military Child".
A resolution recognizing the Interstate Compact on Educational Opportunity for Military Children and expressing support for the designation of April 2024 as the "Month of the Military Child".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution encourages all citizens, communities, and business and government leaders to honor, support, and show appreciation for military-connected children and youth.
